lead_paragraph: The father-in-law of the embattled Tour de France winner Floyd Landis was found dead in his car in San Diego yesterday afternoon after committing suicide, coroner’s officials said. The body of David Witt, 57, was discovered at a parking garage with a gunshot wound to the head, said Paul Parker, an investigator with the San Diego County Medical Examiner. Witt was the stepfather of Landis’s wife, Amber.
